problem_text:
17.15. Construct an algorithm which, for a given polynomial f ∈ Z[x1, x2, . . . , xn], finds (explicitly, in terms of generators) the maximal subgroup Gf of the group Aut(Z[x1, x2, . . . , xn]) that leaves f fixed.
This question is related to description of the solution set of the Diophantine equation f = 0.
V. G. Bardakov
